tw-storydata.tw-passagedata:
Basic text test
[[Link test]] [[Link test 2|Link test]]
<<set $testVar = 1>> testVar is assigned to $testVar
<<set $randVar = random(5,100)>> Random value $randVar
<<if $testVar != $randVar>> If statement test passed. <<else>> If statement test failed. <</if>>
